resources.string: Just Because You\'ve Always Done It That Way Doesn\'t Mean It\'s Not Incredibly Stupid
None Of Us Is As Dumb As All Of Us.
It Could Be That The Purpose Of Your Life Is Only To Serve As A Warning To Others
That Which Does Not Kill Me Postpones The Inevitable
The Art Of Doing Twice As Much As You Should Half As Well As You Could.
The Journey of A Thousand Miles Sometimes Ends Very Badly
Until You Spread Your Wings, You\'ll Have No Idea How Far You Can Walk
No Single Raindrop Believes It Is To Blame For The Flood
True Terror Is To Wake Up One Morning And Discover That Your High School Class Is Running The Country
